name: That's a lot of slimes!
description:
That's a lot of slimes! is a game created for the Quarantine Jam. (My first game jam submission, yay!)

The game is about our shirtless hero, The Slime Slayer and his adventure which consists in killing slimes. A simple, short and infinite game. Have fun!

Everything was made by me, except the player sprite which was generated from here.

Can be played with a keyboard, gamepad and the mouse.

Controls:

            (Arrow Keys / WASD / Gamepad left thumbstick) to move

            (Mouse click / Space) to attack
